noteR.para: Before repairing the sealing, check the sealing of the area concernedvehicle : sealing checkGIEMR-002440.

procedure.title: preparation operation for repairing the sealing

ul.li: the clearances and flush fittings of the opening elements vehicle panel gaps : adjustment valueGIEMR-001316,

the condition and position of the exterior weatherstrip front side opening element window exterior weatherstrip : removal - refittingGIEMR-001504 orrear side opening element window exterior weatherstrip : removal - refittingGIEMR-001503,
the condition and positioning of the side opening element seals.

noteR.para: If the seals are dirty, clean them with soapy watervehicle sealing : general informationGIEMR-002468.

ul.li: NO: move on to the next step.
YES: check the sealing in the area side opening element : sealing checkGIEMR-001457.

procstep.para: Was water present in the passenger compartment of the vehicle?

ul.li: YES: move on to the next step.
NO: fault resolved.

procedure.title: Repairing the sealing of the side opening element sealing film or trim

procstep.para: A) Is water present in the passenger compartment after the sealing of the side opening element trim has been checked?

ul.li: NO: move on to the next step.
YES:

a) if the side opening element trim is deformed or cracked, replace the side opening element trimfront side opening element trim : removal - refittingGIEMR-001274 or rear side opening element trim : removal - refittingGIEMR-001273,

b) if one of the side opening element trim sealing mastics is incorrectly positioned, replace the sealing mastic front side opening element trim : removal - refittingGIEMR-001274 or rear side opening element trim : removal - refittingGIEMR-001273 andvehicle : parts and consumables for the repairGIEMR-002445,

c) if the side opening element trim clips are damaged, replace the clipsfront side opening element trim : removal - refittingGIEMR-001274 orrear side opening element trim : removal - refittingGIEMR-001273.

procstep.para: Check the sealing of the side opening element trim side opening element : sealing checkGIEMR-001457.
B) Is water present in the passenger compartment after the side opening element sealing film has been checked?

ul.li: NO: move on to the next step.
YES:
a) remove the side opening element trim front side opening element trim : removal - refittingGIEMR-001274 orrear side opening element trim : removal - refittingGIEMR-001273,
b) if the side opening element sealing film is detached, deformed or torn, replace the sealing filmside opening element sealing film : removal - refittingGIEMR-001230,

c) if the side opening element trim clips are damaged, replace the clipsfront side opening element trim : removal - refittingGIEMR-001274 or rear side opening element trim : removal - refittingGIEMR-001273,

d) if the sealing foam on the door box section is detached, deformed or torn, replace the foamfront window winder mechanism : removal - refittingGIEMR-001577 orrear side opening element window winder mechanism assembly : removal - refittingGIEMR-001101,

e) if the blanking covers of the door box section are detached, reposition the blanking covers. If the blanking covers are deformed, replace the blanking covers front window winder mechanism : removal - refittingGIEMR-001577 or rear side opening element window winder mechanism assembly : removal - refittingGIEMR-001101.

procstep.para: Check the sealing of the side opening element sealing film side opening element : sealing checkGIEMR-001457.

procedure.title: Repairing the sealing of the side opening element seal

procstep.para: Is water present in the passenger compartment after the side opening element sealing has been checked?

ul.li: NO: fault resolved.
YES:
a) if the side opening element seal is deformed, replace the side opening element seal,
b) if the side opening element seal shows signs of wear, cuts or cracks, replace the side opening element seal.

procstep.para: Check the sealing of the side opening element sealside opening element : sealing checkGIEMR-001457.
